channel.title: Raising Your Vibration with Lisa Gawlas
channel.description:
My Mission: To help all those who wish to explore, to understand, to embrace and to fully utilize the power and wonder of their Spiritual Self within the human framework of life.
We are capable of doing so much more than we have ever realized.... every single one of us (not just a gifted few)!
This is such an exciting time to be alive and aware on planet earth! Step into the power of who you were created to Be!
channel.itunes:subtitle: by Illuminating the Light Within
channel.itunes:author: Lisa Gawlas
channel.itunes:summary:
My Mission: To help all those who wish to explore, to understand, to embrace and to fully utilize the power and wonder of their Spiritual Self within the human framework of life.
We are capable of doing so much more than we have ever realized.... every single one of us (not just a gifted few)!
This is such an exciting time to be alive and aware on planet earth! Step into the power of who you were created to Be!

item.title: The Ego is the Fuel that Creates Your Reailty - What Fuel are You Using?
item.description:
In the ego’s original design, it created that sense of fear, or “fight or flight” feeling within us ONLY to protect us. Us being the incarnate spiritual Being. It is also designed perfectly to know matter. To know how to work with the energies we call matter. In it’s original state, when the heart (which is your soul) has a prompting, it is the ego that know how to make it manifest.

You can also look at it like this, the heart is the magnetic field of attraction, the mind/ego is the fuel that charges up and runs your magnetic field. In order to run in high efficiency, you much use the correct fuel. The new or original ego is high test, the old ego is diesel. Now remember you are the alchemist of your life. Only you can change the fuel that drives your life.
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas

Only you can change the fuel that drives your life.

item.title: What is Shambhala and where is it really?
item.description: Shambhala is the very energy of God realization. The very field of existence where heaven and earth are one. Shambhala is the highest field of energy available to all humans who has done their inner work and raised their vibration to the point of accessing it and living within it. This sacred energy is so special, so incredibly potent in its expression that it literally takes two people to unlock the energy and bring it here to earth. This energy is the true God potential in all of us. The very energy that effortlessly turned loaves into fish, water into wine and created instant healing with a simple touch of the hand. And WE must bring it back into the field of matter! This podcasts tell you how we can do this!!

item.title: Back again after 2 years of audible silence!
item.description: This is the first of many new podcasts to come. I kept this one simple and took the liberty of giving thanks to those in Egypt, and across the world who are daring to stand together and demand freedom. That is truly change we can raise our vibrations within, and not an easy thing to do!!

item.itunes:summary: This is the first of many new podcasts to come. I kept this one simple and took the liberty of giving thanks to those in Egypt, and across the world who are daring to stand together and demand freedom. That is truly change we can raise our vibrations within, and not an easy thing to do!!

item.title: Learn to Truly Meditate - Release the Control of Your Mind.
item.description: Contrary to popular belief, there is no right or wrong ways to do meditation. Your body already knows how to reach this beautiful and natural state within yourself.... Trust in yourSelf. Learning to meditate will not only allow you to live stress free, but also opens communication to the spiritual realm for guidance and assistance in your life!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary:
Contrary to popular belief, there is no right or wrong ways to do meditation. Your body already knows how to reach this beautiful and natural state within yourself.... Trust in yourSelf.
Learning to meditate will not only allow you to live stress free, but also opens communication to the spiritual realm for guidance and assistance in your life!

item.title: The Seed Meditation
item.description: This is NOT a guided meditation but one for you to follow by yourself once you have reached that place of meditation where stillness lays and the mind has faded gently into the background of your Being. This meditation will tell you so much about yourself. Enjoy the journey!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: This is NOT a guided meditation but one for you to follow by yourself once you have reached that place of meditation where stillness lays and the mind has faded gently into the background of your Being. This meditation will tell you so much about yourself. Enjoy the journey!

item.title: CIty of Light Meditation
item.description: This meditation is multi-layered to help you see the beauty within your life (garden), deal with your emotions (foot bridge) and connect with your spirit guides/angels (City of Light). Please be patient with yourself with this meditation, if you dedicate yourself to this exercise, I promise you, you will have conscious communication with your spirit guides/angels. Enjoy the journey, say hi to spirit for me!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary:
This meditation is multi-layered to help you see the beauty within your life (garden), deal with your emotions (foot bridge) and connect with your spirit guides/angels (City of Light). Please be patient with yourself with this meditation, if you dedicate yourself to this exercise, I promise you, you will have conscious communication with your spirit guides/angels.
Enjoy the journey, say hi to spirit for me!

item.title: A Ouija Board, Meditations, Profound Healing and Visions Part 1
item.description: Be the change you want to see in the world.” Mahatma Gandhi We can all sit back and say, “Ohhh this needs to change, that needs to change” and then wait for someone to actually do it. At this moment in time, that is how the majority of people are, not because they are lazy (although some are) but because they are not sure what to do, and how to go about doing it. What if there was a way.... would you BE THE CHANGE THAT IS NEEDED?? Part 1 of 2
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary:
Be the change you want to see in the world.” Mahatma Gandhi
We can all sit back and say, “Ohhh this needs to change, that needs to change” and then wait for someone to actually do it. At this moment in time, that is how the majority of people are, not because they are lazy (although some are) but because they are not sure what to do, and how to go about doing it.
What if there was a way.... would you BE THE CHANGE THAT IS NEEDED??
Part 1 of 2

item.title: Part 2 of A Ouija Board, Meditations, Profound Healing & Visions
item.description: Let me be your example of potential, of hope, of what can and will be. I am supported by an endless source of love and companionship in the spiritual realm that brought me to here, and now I need that same love and companionship, the same level of service, in the human realm. We are family, we are more powerful and resourceful than you can imagine! Together, we can Be the Change we dream of! In spirit’s eyes, there is no such thing as a dream that is too big. If we can dream it, we can create it!

item.title: Taking Back Your Power Part 2
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas

item.title: Taking Back Your Power part 1
item.description: We have learned to give our power away since we were children, leaving us exhuasted and often times ill. Learn to take back your power and become A Fully Empowered Spiritual Human!!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: We have learned to give our power away since we were children, leaving us exhuasted and often times ill. Learn to take back your power and become A Fully Empowered Spiritual Human!!

item.title: The Great Shift - Moving from Separation to Unity
item.description: This video was made on election day here in the USA, now that we as a collective truly have made the choice of unity with electing obama as president, we the people now must stay within the responsibility to continue to put forth our efforts of caring, compassion and wellbeing for all. This is a channeled message that came thru me to be printed in our magazine The Wonder of You. For those who do not receive our magaine, the message is now here for you to enjoy!! Namaste

item.title: 10 Blocks to Manifesting Your Desires - Part II
item.description:
The are 10 things that we d quite uncosciously that actually block our ability to manifest what our hearts desire. In part I I talked about how to manifest, this one helps you learn how to stay out of your own way.
Please bear with our newness of videocasting, we will get better as we go (smile).

item.title: Laws of Attraction and Manifestation - Part 1
item.description: Well I have moved out from behind the microphone to infron of the camera (yikes). This videocast is filmed out of our Center "The Wonder of You" and features myself and my friend and business partner Peggy Aguero talking about What is really behind the laws of attraction and manifestation, there is so much more to it all than just visualizing and wishing!!! Enjoy our first in a long line of videocasts!!!

item.title: The Changing Landscape - Whats Happening on Planet Earth Part 2
item.description: We - as a global society are changing from both the inside out and the outside in. Our weather patterns have intensified and is literally changing the landscape of the globe... and now our financial markets are doing the very same thing, but hitting us from the inside, where we live and what we have counted on up until now. And now, we are at one of the most crucial choice points ever... do WE do something... or continue to let others do it for us (actually for themselves, because WE are not in their true scheme of things).

item.title: Politics and Unified Action
item.description: Unless you are in a complete coma, you can see CHANGE not only taking place all around you, but speeding down the streets as we move on by. Like any change that has ever come before, it appears scary... but really it is the most exciting time in our own USA history... save the 1776 Deloration of Independance (smile). Wall Street is collapsing and we should celebrate NOT get scared. Change can only take place when the old moves out of the way. But... the old is trying to hang onto dear life... excuse me, dear money.... so what can WE do... just listen!!

item.title: Be Clear! Magification Energies starting August 2008
item.description: Starting with the solar eclipse of August 1st 2008 everything we think, do, say and most especially FEEL will become magnified within our earthly reality. There has never been a more important time on planet earth to clear your inner fears and worries, because ready or not, all will be magnified for you to see, experience and either deal with or ride the tide of Joy (depending on what you are truly feeling within).

item.title: Shifting Into Ascention
item.description: What we knew of Ascention in the old energy is NOT what it is in the new energy. The days of just vibrating right off of planet earth are gone. Now, we stay in body and move thru the Ascention or Enlightenment process. There are 8 inner shifts to help you understand where you are in your own ascention process, all talked about in this podcast. Be forewarned, this is a long podcast (smile).

item.title: My Own Healing Journey
item.description: How I came to start this spiritual path and how I ended up healing myself without ever really trying!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: How I came to start this spiritual path and how I ended up healing myself without ever really trying!

item.title: Healing Yourself - what is involved
item.description: Healing is a process and usually not an over night event. The more you stay dilegent to your healing process, the quicker and more completely you heal.
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: Healing is a process and usually not an over night event. The more you stay dilegent to your healing process, the quicker and more completely you heal.

item.title: Energy, Vibration, Earth and You!
item.description: Earth has changed her vibration, and will continue to change thru 2012, as she changes, so is everyone and everything on this planet. This energy is magnificent, but can be viewed as less than that because it makes you change... there is no choice really... as the earth shifst so must you, fight it and you will find yourself on the other side of the veil, go with it, and life transforms into the most incredible adventure ever!! Either way is perfectly wonderful, there is no judgement on how you experience this energetically brand new planet called earth!

item.title: Choosing your experience
item.description: The time for your to realize you are choosing your experience is now. If you are not having a pleasant experience, you can change it by consciously unleashing your spiritual power from within. This is an exciting time to be awake on planet earth!!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: The time for your to realize you are choosing your experience is now. If you are not having a pleasant experience, you can change it by consciously unleashing your spiritual power from within. This is an exciting time to be awake on planet earth!!

item.title: Raising your vibration
item.description: Planet earth is currently undergoing massive changes both energetically and physically, the ride will be much better for us humans if we start adjusting to this new and exciting vibration that is already present and growing! Raising our vibration has never been easier!!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas

item.title: What's Happening on Planet Earth? Part 1
item.description: As of Oct. 1st 2007 there is a massive (spiritual) energy surge coming onto the planet. This podcast is going to be continued thru out the month of Oct as I get more information on what is happening and how it will affect all of us globally and personally.

item.title: A Nation of Karma – The History of the United States
item.description: ..."So here we are sitting squarely in the land of Karma… a karma that is not so pleasant… and now we have the choice once again…. Are we going to fuel more negative karma or finally make a choice to change it all.. change the way we are experiencing life. If we keep in the blame game, waiting for someone else to take responsibly, we have already chosen the most difficult way… which is our current reality here in the US...."
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas

item.title: Changing Our Past to Effect Our Present
item.description: Understanding how we can change our past and have it completely and postively effect our present! Amazing really!!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: Understanding how we can change our past and have it completely and postively effect our present! Amazing really!!

item.title: The Kundalini of Life
item.description:
If you are not already familiar with what Kundalini is, please visit my website at www.spiritualhealing-godsway.org/kundalini.html
The shifting of energies we felt in June 2007 was actually the physical releasing of Earths Kundalini energy rising upwards thru the veil. We are ALL affected by this energy. How depends on where you focus.. fear or love. Now is the time to get ready for the b"big one" Gods Kundalini being released!

item.title: The Blue Moon and Energy Shift that came with it!
item.description:
This blue moon phase rocked my world and the planet we live upon. This is my experience with the energy shift... push, that came with the 2nd full moon (called the blue moon) during May 2007!!
Hang on folks... the ride just got incredibly wild!!!

item.title: Using Meditation to its Fullest Potential!
item.description: Meditation is much more than going in and being still... it is the doorway to incredible adventures, information, and truth!!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: Meditation is much more than going in and being still... it is the doorway to incredible adventures, information, and truth!!

item.title: Chaos to Clarity - How Meditation Saved my Life!
item.description: This is the story of how I came into this spiritual path and whence I came from. It also details how important, how incredible meditation really is and what is possible thru it. It is a long session, which I try to keep these podcast sessions short and to the point, but I felt the details of it all were too important to skip over. May you be inspired!

item.title: Follow the Signs of Your Life
item.description: We are constantly guided on what we should be doing and where we should be heading in each and every momeny in many many ways... most of the time, we simply do not pay attention and wonder how we ended up on a dead end street!

item.title: Opening to the Spiritual Realm Hypnosis CD
item.description:
Learning to relax the mind and body and be open to the spiritual information that is available to everyone one of us is as easy as listening to this CD.
Be sure you are wearing comfortable clothing, no shoes, and have the volume just above audable, be sure your head and neck are supported, then just relax as you drift upwards to the realm of spirit.
Enjoy the journey!

item.title: The Evolution & Elimination of Fear
item.description: How are we controlled? Fear! Fear is the only thing allowing each one of us to experience repression, illness, lonilessness and thru it all, we give away both our freedom as well as our personal power. The time is now to stop the evolution of fear.... Be Love - Be truly FREE, its always YOUR choice!

item.title: Who Are YOU Anyway?
item.description: Think about this question... Who Are YOU... most people have a ready made answer to go with it, which actually limits who you REALLY ARE!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: Think about this question... Who Are YOU... most people have a ready made answer to go with it, which actually limits who you REALLY ARE!

item.title: The Wonder of You
item.description:
There is power in our sexual energy that most people take for granted because they do not understand the “whole” of it all. The places the orgasm can take is awe-amazing!
What if… Our sexual energy, when shared with pure love in the heart with another was our closest connection to our Creator?
What if… The energetic exchange merged these three energies as one (you, partner, & Creator)?
What if… The creation of the soul was done through the orgasmic flow of our Creator, in a pure and loving state so that when we shared ourselves in this manner, in the physical world of Being, could we not touch and feel the heart of God within the exchange?
Your Sensual, Sexual, Orgasmic energy is your place of power - Spiritual Power

item.title: Spirit Guides and Angels
item.description: What are spirit guides and what purpose do they serve in our physical lives?
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: What are spirit guides and what purpose do they serve in our physical lives?

item.title: What is Conscious Living?
item.description:
Living consciously is more than realizing you are a body and in the physical place we call life. Every thought, word and deed has a far reaching effect…. even on people you do not know!
Every thought, word and deed you put “out there” comes back to you! What reality have you created for yourself and how is it affecting others?
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary:
Living consciously is more than realizing you are a body and in the physical place we call life. Every thought, word and deed has a far reaching effect…. even on people you do not know!
Every thought, word and deed you put “out there” comes back to you! What reality have you created for yourself and how is it affecting others?

item.title: Beliefs Create Your Reality
item.description: There is a powerful energy creating the reality you know as your life… that energy is YOU! The engine that creates your life thru you is your belief system! Is there something about yourself or your life you want changed… then start with what you believe about that area. Better yet… stay away from any beliefs! are simply what someone else told you is true… not that it is true… Truth is very different than a belief!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas

item.title: Life Really Isn't In Gods Hands.... It's in YOURS!
item.description:
Many of us have said prayers that seem to go unanswered… unfullfilled…. but why? Maybe it is because YOU did nothing to create the energy of the prayer/desire in YOUR life.
YOU ARE THE GOD YOU ARE PRAYING TO!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Illusion - Two realities happening at once!
item.description: I have always heard the statements: ”what you perceive is what you receive”, “you only experience what you focus on” and so on, but until the other day, I did not realize just how true those statements are. Reality is multilayered and shows itself according to what you focus on! This is my experience and understanding of the days to come for all of us!

item.title: Ask, and you shall receive!
item.description: Nothing is ever hidden from us, we just keep looking outside of ourselves for the answers... your truth is within!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: Nothing is ever hidden from us, we just keep looking outside of ourselves for the answers... your truth is within!

item.title: Kundalini and Time
item.description: The one thing I have found, there is a lot of "missing" information in any given idea (human idea's) including what Kundalini really is and how to utalize the energy, your soul energy for your health and highest good!
item.dc:creator: Lisa Gawlas
item.itunes:summary: The one thing I have found, there is a lot of "missing" information in any given idea (human idea's) including what Kundalini really is and how to utalize the energy, your soul energy for your health and highest good!

item.title: When Death Enters Yor Life
item.description: Death does not happen just once in a lifetime… We have experienced death in many ways, many times in our lifetimes and will continue to do so until we leave this physical body. A death of a relationship, the end of a job, the breaking of a vehicle, a house catching fire…. death comes in many ways and for only one reason, to make way for the new energy that is trying to enter. Where we get hung up in life is trying to cling to the old, or stay in a state of mourning/depression, that is when the death cycle becomes hardest. Letting go…. letting the universe take care of you thru your percieved losses…. that will bring the quickest and most joyous new life to you. But how do you to that?? This is my story of my story..
